classification: Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects; Judaica
description: two-tiered square tower with movable flag on top on a base made of four wires extending to a square foot; each corner of the foot sits atop a small silver dome; the walls of all tiers done in openwork
markings: GR (in oval) |   T (in center of small circle; top of T bisects circle) | 13 (above T in the small circle) | F (above small circle) | 1 (above) 5 (to left) | 8 (above) 7 (to right) (all in a circular punch, the bottom of which extends out of silver surface)
provenance: (William Gross, Tel Aviv, Israel); Purchased by the MIA in 2000.
title: Spice container
